Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Bathroom, Self-catering facilities, Refrigerator, Safe box, Direct dial phone. Playground, Opened May 2009.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: Located on Stelida in Naxos Island Greece and offers magic views to the sea, to both Naxos Town - 3km and Agios Prokopios, Stelida beach - 5min walk.
